Title: Niscomed FPO-50 Pulse Oximeter
Description: The Niscomed FPO-50 pulse oximeter has been immaculately engineered to effectively determine and read your pulse rate and oxygen percentage in your blood in the comforts of your own home. This Niscomed FPO-50 is a fingertip oximeter that needs to be clipped onto your fingers and preferably your index finger for the light sensors in the oximeter to quickly and precisely sense and measure the saturated oxygen in your blood. Build Built to enhance comfort and ease of use, this Niscomed pulse oximeter is user-friendly and simple in its operation, capable of delivering fast and easy spot-checks. This pulse oximeter is small and compact, thereby allowing enhanced portability. Armed with a clear and easy-to-view LED screen, this Niscomed pulse oximeter capably displays your pulse rates and blood saturated oxygen levels in BPM and SpO2 units respectively shown along a pleth waveform. The LED display in the Niscomed FPO-50 pulse oximeter functions with enhanced efficacy as it is equipped with dual display colors and four-levels adjustable brightness features, making it convenient for you. You can also view your readings comfortably as this pulse oximeter allows six modes of display directions enabling you to read your results in six different angles. Performance The Niscomed pulse oximter provides a safe and comfortable measuring procedure as this device utilizes a non-invasive method to procure your saturated oxygen readings or the amount of oxygen carried by the hemoglobin in your red blood cells. You simply have to place your fingers between the clip-ons in the device and press the button for your measurement process to function. This pulse oximeter utilizes light-emitting diodes to detect the oxygen content in your blood. When you start the device, it emits light which immediately passes through the sensors in your skin, measuring the hemoglobin in your blood. Two types of lights comprising of red and infrared are emitted, wherein the oxygenated blood absorbs the wavelength of the red light and the deoxygenated blood absorbs the wavelength of the infrared light. While the oxygenated and deoxygenated blood absorb different light wavelengths, the oximeter operates to find the ratio between the two and gives you the relative measurement, therefore providing you an accurate estimate of your blood oxygen saturation. Besides performing efficiently and delivering accurate results, the Niscomed pulse oximeter also comes with convenient features that give you a comfortable user experience. The Auto shut-off feature in the Niscomed FPO-50 pulse oximeter enables the device to immediately shut down if left idle for more than 5 seconds, therefore conserving energy and allowing safe usage. Moreover, the display format is also saved when your device shuts down automatically, preventing data loss. For enhanced convenience, this Pulse oximeter also displays your battery status and indicates when your battery is low. This Niscomed pulse oximeter requires 2 AAA batteries to function soundly.
